name: Temper
description:
Multiplayer fps game, with 3 classes at the moment(mage,archer,ninja)!

Coincollecter gamemode is active right now. Rules: the first player who collects 20 coins wins the game, the player who dies or disconnects drops all their coins on the ground. The gamemode only starts when there are at least 2 players in the room. 

All classes have a basic attack, a mobility and a defensive ability. use them wisely to defeat your opponents.

Matchmaking service is available but limited to FIVE 4 player sized rooms (max 20 players) ,if you like the game please consider buying it, the income will be used to upgrade the servers and to add more features to the game(more classes, maps,gamemodes, etc.) 

Feel free to leave a comment below! Thanks for playing!

Devlog: https://andris96.itch.io/tempe...

Controls in game:
WASD - move
LEFT SHIFT - sprint
SPACE - jump
LEFT CLICK - fire
RIGHT CLICK - mobility ability
F - defensive ability
E(hold) - pick up coins
ESCAPE - show pause screen
TAB - show leaderboard
